document_data.name: Mere
document_data.mainbody: '''Mere''' was a servant of the [[Knights of the Black Sword]] who lived in [[Caer-Dineval]] as of the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The young [[tiefling]] wanted free from their life as a servant but was incredibly fearful of their captor. Mere garnered a fair amount of knowledge about the cultish Knights, including their ties to [[Levistus]], the layout of their [[Caer-Dineval keep|personal keep]], as well as the group's hatred of the local [[duergar]].
document_data.History: Circa the {{YearlinkName|1489}}, Mere was living in [[Bryn Shander]] when they were "found" by the [[fiend]]ish cult leader [[Kadroth]]. The elder tiefling brought the young beggar to Caer-Dineval to act as his group's personal servant.
